mmu/gdt.h¶

struct GdtT_¶

Global descriptor table structure

struct GdtPtr_¶

Global descriptor table pointer structure

void initGdtDescriptor(u32 base, u32 limite, u8 accessibility, u8 flags, GdtT *Gdt_Desc)¶

Global descriptor table initialisation:

Paramètres

  • base – physical memory begin of the described segment

  • limite – size of the described segment (See intel doc)

  • accessibility – See intel documentation

  • flags – See intel documentation

  • Gdt_Desc – Adress of the descriptor to be write

Global descriptor table
